PartnerNetworkRecordConnection.name: PartnerNetworkRecordConnection
PartnerNetworkRecordConnection.description: Represents a record shared between Salesforce organizations using Salesforce to Salesforce.

ConnectionId.description: Required. ID of the connection a record is shared with.

EndDate.description: Date that sharing of the record was stopped.

LocalRecordId.description: Required. ID of the shared record.

ParentRecordId.description: ID of the parent record of the shared record.

PartnerRecordId.description: ID of the shared record in the connection's organization.

RelatedRecords.description: A comma-separated list of API names for child records to be shared with a parent record.

SendClosedTasks.description: Forwards closed tasks related to the shared record.

SendEmails.description: Sends an email notifying the connection's representative that you have forwarded the record to them. Only new recipients of a record will receive a notification email.

SendOpenTasks.description: Forwards open tasks related to the shared record.

StartDate.description: Date that the shared record was accepted.

Status.description: The status of the shared record. One of the following values: Active (received) Active (sent) Connected Inactive Inactive (converted) Inactive (deleted) Pending (sent)
